description:
Using a combination of Django and Django REST Framework, we will build a
Restaurant Menu that can be managed via a REST API. Starting from the
install of the Django REST Framework, we will build our way to a
functional API that meets the needs of developers and end-users. You
will walk away with an understanding of the basic concepts of REST APIs
and a working sample project.
quality_notes: Partial tutorial, only the beginning of the tutorial was recorded, sorry for the inconvenience
title: Building a REST API Using Django & Django REST Framework
